SELECT No, Player_Name, Player_Team, Earned_Run_Average, Game_Num, Win, Lose, Save, Hold, Winning_Percentage, Innings_Pitched, Hits, Home_Run, Base_On_Balls, Hit_By_Pitch, Strike_Out, Runs, Earned_Run, WHIP, Complete_Game, Shutout, Quality_Start, Blown_Save, Total_Batters_Faced, Number_Of_Pitching, Opponent_Batting_Average, two_Base, three_Base, Sacrifice_Bunt, Sacrifice_Fly, IBB, Wild_Pitch, Balk FROM kbo_pitcher_stats_2024 WHERE Player_Team = #{teamName} and Innings_Pitched > 50 and Game_Num<=35 ORDER BY Player_Name

SELECT No, Player_Name, Player_Team, Batting_average, Game_Num, Plate_Appearance, At_Bat, Run, Hit, two_Base, three_Base, Home_Run, Total_Base, Runs_Batted_In, Sacrifice_Bunts, Sacrifice_Fly, Four_Ball, IBB, Hit_by_Pitch, Strike_Out, Double_out, Slugging, On_Base_Percentage, Onbase_Plus_Slug, Multi_Hit, Scoring_Position_AVG, Pinch_Hit_AVG FROM kbo_hitter_stats_2025
ORDER BY Batting_average DESC ORDER BY Game_Num DESC ORDER BY Plate_Appearance DESC ORDER BY Run DESC ORDER BY Hit DESC ORDER BY two_Base DESC ORDER BY three_Base DESC ORDER BY Home_Run DESC ORDER BY Runs_Batted_In DESC ORDER BY Four_Ball DESC ORDER BY Strike_Out DESC ORDER BY On_Base_Percentage DESC ORDER BY Onbase_Plus_Slug DESC ORDER BY Player_Name ASC

SELECT No, Player_Name, Player_Team, Earned_Run_Average, Game_Num, Win, Lose, Save, Hold, Winning_Percentage, Innings_Pitched, Hits, Home_Run, Base_On_Balls, Hit_By_Pitch, Strike_Out, Runs, Earned_Run, WHIP, Complete_Game, Shutout, Quality_Start, Blown_Save, Total_Batters_Faced, Number_Of_Pitching, Opponent_Batting_Average, two_Base, three_Base, Sacrifice_Bunt, Sacrifice_Fly, IBB, Wild_Pitch, Balk FROM kbo_pitcher_stats_2025
ORDER BY Earned_Run_Average ASC ORDER BY Game_Num DESC ORDER BY Win DESC ORDER BY Lose ASC ORDER BY Save DESC ORDER BY Hold DESC ORDER BY Innings_Pitched DESC ORDER BY Hits ASC ORDER BY Home_Run ASC ORDER BY Base_On_Balls ASC ORDER BY Strike_Out DESC ORDER BY Runs ASC ORDER BY Earned_Run ASC ORDER BY WHIP ASC ORDER BY Player_Name ASC
SELECT No, Team_Name, Game_Num, Win, Lose, Draw, Win_Percentage, Games_Behind FROM kbo_team_stats_2025 ORDER BY Win_Percentage DESC

(SELECT 'default' as user_id, Player_Team as team_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Batting_average DESC) as position, Player_Name as player_name, CAST(No AS VARCHAR(255)) as player_id FROM kbo_hitter_stats_2024 WHERE Player_Team = #{teamName} ORDER BY Batting_average DESC LIMIT 9) UNION ALL (SELECT 'default' as user_id, Player_Team as team_name, 'P' as position, Player_Name as player_name, CAST(No AS VARCHAR(255)) as player_id FROM kbo_pitcher_stats_2024 WHERE Player_Team = #{teamName} ORDER BY Earned_Run_Average ASC LIMIT 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO custom_lineup (user_id, team_name, position, player_name, player_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{teamName}, #{position}, #{playerName}, #{playerId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM custom_lineup WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND team_name = #{teamName}
